page.title: 04Farmer's Wife
page.content: I start by milking the goats,feeding them,the hens and geese and letting them out to graze.I bottle goats milk and put it to cool.I feed the children,take them to school and deliver the milk.My husband will have finished milking the cows.I supply his breakfast,wash the pots,tidy up and make lunch.In the afternoon I may help with the hay,silage or harvest.I may have to help with anything from taking a tractor to pieces to calving a cow.Next I bring the children home and do the dinner.I milk the goats,feed the animals and collect and wash the eggs.The rest of the evening is more or less my own.My favourite pastimes are gardening in summer and knitting in winter.
